alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Grant (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 4:48PM PDT until May 27 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central and North Central Washington, including the following counties, in Central Washington, Grant. In North Central Washington, Douglas. * WHEN...Until 645 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 448 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Rainfall rates in excess of an inch per hour have been observed with storms in the area this afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ephrata, Lakeview, Soap Lake and Laveview Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
